discourse_list.title: EIP-1588: Proposal for a new hardfork meta to implement a new Proof-of-Work algorithm

content.content: github.com/ethereum/EIPs       EIP-1588: Proposal for a new hardfork meta to implement a new Proof-of-Work algorithm     by naikmyeong   on 08:10PM - 15 Nov 18 UTC   1 commits   changed 1 files   with 29 additions   and 0 deletions.
content.GPT-summary: The post is a proposal for a new hardfork meta to implement a new Proof-of-Work algorithm in Ethereum. The author is explaining the proposal and providing details about the changes. A third party could give constructive criticism, ask questions, or review the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
